text.text: Welcome to Blockbench 4.0, the Mesh Update!

features.title: Tabs!
features.text: Open multiple models at the same time and easily switch between them using the new project tabs!

features.title: Poly Mesh Editing!
features.text: Blockbench now supports poly mesh editing, which let's you create and modify any type of shape in generic models.

features.title: Theme Browser
features.text: You can now discover and switch to new themes directly inside Blockbench. Also, the theme menu and the other settings menus have been re-designed and cleaned up!
